categories: Category:Return of the Jedi Official Poster Monthly

nodes.text: Return of the Jedi Official Poster Monthly

Return of the Jedi Official Poster Monthly was a magazine published by Paradise Press beginning in May 1983. It was the continuation of the Star Wars Official Poster Monthly (1977-1979) and The Empire Strikes Back Official Poster Monthly (1980). Four monthly issues were produced, with issue 4 appearing in August 1983. The cover price in the United States was $1.95.

Its main feature was a large full-color poster of a character or scene from Return of the Jedi, along with a number of articles. The articles included character profiles and behind the scenes information.
